mapper.select: select r.title, r.address, (SELECT file_url FROM image_files WHERE entity_id = r.room_id AND entity_type = 'rooms' ORDER BY uploaded_at ASC LIMIT 1) AS roomImageUrl from rooms r where r.user_id = #{userId};

select r.name as roomName, u.name as userName, b.start_date, b.end_date, b.guests_num, b.status, (SELECT file_url FROM image_files WHERE entity_id = r.room_id AND entity_type = 'rooms' ORDER BY uploaded_at ASC LIMIT 1) AS room_image_url from books b join users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id join rooms r ON b.room_id = r.room_id where r.user_id = #{userId} and b.status = '완료' and b.end_date = current_date()

select r.name as roomName, u.name as userName, b.start_date, b.end_date, b.guests_num, b.status, (SELECT file_url FROM image_files WHERE entity_id = r.room_id AND entity_type = 'rooms' ORDER BY uploaded_at ASC LIMIT 1) AS room_image_url from books b join users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id join rooms r ON b.room_id = r.room_id where r.user_id = #{userId} and current_date() between b.start_date and b.end_date

select r.name as roomName, u.name as userName, b.start_date, b.end_date, b.guests_num, b.status, (SELECT file_url FROM image_files WHERE entity_id = r.room_id AND entity_type = 'rooms' ORDER BY uploaded_at ASC LIMIT 1) AS room_image_url from books b left join users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id left join rooms r ON b.room_id = r.room_id where r.user_id = #{userId} and b.status = '완료' and b.start_date = current_date()

select r.name as roomName, u.name as userName, b.start_date, b.end_date, b.guests_num, b.status, (SELECT file_url FROM image_files WHERE entity_id = r.room_id AND entity_type = 'rooms' ORDER BY uploaded_at ASC LIMIT 1) AS room_image_url from books b join users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id join rooms r ON b.room_id = r.room_id where r.user_id = #{userId} and b.start_date > current_date() and b.status in ('대기', '완료') order by b.start_date

select r.name as roomName, u.name as userName, b.start_date, b.end_date, b.guests_num, b.status, (SELECT file_url FROM image_files WHERE entity_id = r.room_id AND entity_type = 'rooms' ORDER BY uploaded_at ASC LIMIT 1) AS room_image_url, rv.review_id, h.host_id from books b join users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id join rooms r ON b.room_id = r.room_id join review rv ON b.book_id = rv.book_id join host h ON h.user_id = r.user_id where rv.host_reply is null and r.user_id = #{userId};
